title: Strongbow beer
content:
Anyone know what font (or a similar one) used in the Strongbow beer ? ![strong](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202150304im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/12995.gif)

 [‹ Tanqueray No. Ten?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202150304/http:/www.typophile.com/node/633 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) October 18, 2003 - Fairfield {John Nolan} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202150304/http:/www.typophile.com/node/643 "Go to next forum topic")
author: anonymous

comments.content:
Isn't Strongbow a cider?   
   
This would be a much better post if I followed that up with an answer to the question.   
   
- the ever impertinent paul
Could it be [New Age](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202150304/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/galapagos/new-age/condensed-bold/testdrive.html?s=STRONGBOW&p=72), with some slight modifications?
